attributes.review:
Do NOT and I repeat do NOT download this app 😡. I wish i could give this app 0 stars 0️⃣. When I downloaded the app it kept causing my phone to crash and glitch 📱. I finally was able to get the app to work I opened it and it was a picture of a ugly pig on my screen 🐷. I was later informed that it was president Trump. I nearly had a heart attack 😟❤️💔. Then the app sent me notifications insulting me and threatening to kill my family. The message read “Hi. I am president poopy pants. I hate n words. I like little kids. Vote for me 🤪”. Very unimpressed but not surprised 🙄. The app also steals your information and puts it on the dark web for people to see ⬛️🕸. I know this because Whatsapp told me lol. It targets people above the age of 30 and it steals your address and text messages 😝. It also can look through your photos and if they find anything remotely sexual Donald Trump will use it to please himself 😳. -42069666 stars for me. 

Sincerely,
Melania Trump
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER!!!!1!11!

attributes.review: This app is horrible. I downloaded it to know more about the first family. Unfortunately all I got was ads for having an affair on AshlayMadison.com. I don’t know if the app and the president support this kind of wedsite. I made an account and met a man. It was MIKE PENCE!!! I could not believe it. I was told to have sexual relations with Trump and he would pay me like stormy Daniels. All I wanted was to check on Barron Trump to make sure he is alright. We haven’t seen the little bugger in a while.
attributes.title: Just horrible

attributes.review: don’t get this app!! as soon as i did my dogs went missing!! i think trump killed them and made them fur coats. i’m crying right now he’s such an orange😭😭😭 anyways, do not i repeat do not get this app. it’s seriously the worst app ever and i uncovered a secret part in the app where u need a code i guessed it correctly and it took my to a site that showed me trumps nudes 🍤. now i’m scarred for life.
attributes.title: don’t get this app
